name: Octopus Jungle Lite!
description:
You're the octopus in this gravity-defying adventure as you hurl yourself through the lush jungle in the pursuit of riches.
- Addicting swinging mechanics
- Easy to learn, impossible to master
- 23+ levels
- Retina support
- Plays on iPhone & iPad!
- From the makers of Kickoff

Fire your tentacles sky-high as you soar through the air, grabbing dangling hooks to avoid the likes of slithery electric eels, blowfish, and elusive water snakes. Octopus Jungle captures the excitement of Spiderman, constantly in pursuit of the perfect swing as you elegantly dodge danger. Challenge your mind, reflexes, rhythm, and instincts.

Video Trailer:
